mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (created_by, updated_by, create_at, update_at, email, password, nickname, delYN, profile_cont) VALUES (#{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{delYN}, #{profileCont});
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET created_by = #{createdBy}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, create_at = #{createdAt}, update_at = #{updatedAt}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, delYN = #{delYN}, profile_cont = #{profileCont} WHERE seq = #{seq};
